bug.author: JimmyWhitaker
bug.summary: Deleting Artifacts when they are linked to a Pipeline causes Unrecoverable Error
bug.description: If I delete an artifact that is connected to a pipeline, the pipeline is unrecoverable.

comments.comment: This is a problem with the current method of downcasting. Currently, it instantiates the given target type (resulting in the deletion propogating to the data type). I will be updating it to copy the relevant info rather than instantiating it
